trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin alchemist can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage in melee, or 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Acid Bomb (3/Day)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

Hit or miss the bomb explodes. The target and each creature within 10ft of the point where the Acid Bomb exploded must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage.

action.name: Alchemist's Fire (3/Day)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. On a hit the target is covered in a flaming adhesive and takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a {@dc 12} Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.
